Call Upon His Name - Streams in the Desert - May 3

"And it shall come to pass that whosoever shall call on the name of the Lord shall be delivered" (Joel 2:32). 🙏✨

Why don't I call on His name first? 🤔 Why run to neighbors 👫 when God is so near? Why make complicated plans 📝 when I can simply trust Him?

🔹 Straight to God is the best way! 🏃‍♂️💨
I won't find deliverance anywhere else - but with God it's guaranteed because He promised! 💝

I don't need to wonder "Can I call on Him?" ❓ That word "Whosoever" means anyone - and that includes me! 🙋‍♂️ So I'll call on Him right now! 📢

My situation seems impossible 😰 - but that's not my problem to solve. The One who made the promise will figure out how to keep it! 🤗

My job: To call on Him 📞
His job: To deliver me ✝️
I'm His servant 👨‍🍳 - not His advisor 💼

- C. H. Spurgeon
